bibl.author: Henry Stanbery
bibl.title: Henry Stanbery to Orville Hickman Browning, 14 November 1867

revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I have the honor to transmit herewith the account, by me approved, and amounting to One thousand dollars, of Richard H. Dana, Jr. being his retaining fee as associate counsel for the United States, appointed by me, in the case of Jefferson Davis, pending in the United States District Court of Virginia, and to request its payment out of the appropriate fund.
